toc_entry.title: Funky Riviera
toc_entry.description: Discover another side of the Texas coast —its peerless beachcombing, legendary beer joints, odd birds {feathered and otherwise), and lovable year-round scruffiness.

toc_entry.title: Phantom Cat Of the Valley
toc_entry.description: Meet the ocelot, not as pet, not as fur coat, but in its best role —an elusive remnant of Texas’ wild past.

toc_entry.title: George Bush, Plucky Lad
toc_entry.description: Can a man be right and be president? The vice president, who still believes in all the old-fashioned boys'-novel virtues, thinks so.

toc_entry.title: The Name Belt
toc_entry.subtitle: Texas Primer
toc_entry.description: Wearing one won’t make you a real live cowboy, but it sure will brand you as a modern Texan.

toc_entry.title: It’s Just Another Day
toc_entry.description: Kids, house, husband—these are the natural enemies of a well-ordered day.

toc_entry.title: For Names’ Sake
toc_entry.description: Life is tough all over, but especially for Juniors.

toc_entry.title: Three Feet Six, Blue Tights, Red Cape
toc_entry.subtitle: Kids
toc_entry.description: Forget firemen and cowboys. Today’s kid wants to be a superhero.

toc_entry.title: The Retrograde Sophisticate
toc_entry.subtitle: art
toc_entry.description: Danny Williams of Dallas has a clear grasp of the modern masters and unequaled ambition and skill.

toc_entry.title: Out Of the Cuckoo’s Nest
toc_entry.subtitle: Health
toc_entry.description: For many of Texas' mental patients, the world outside the state hospital is what's keeping them sane.

toc_entry.title: Midland On a String
toc_entry.subtitle: Classieal Music
toc_entry.description: From out of the West Texas plains comes the rich, beautiful sound of the Thouvenel String Quartet.

toc_entry.title: The Sphinx Who Sings
toc_entry.subtitle: Popular Music
toc_entry.description: Austin blueswoman angela Strehli is an enigma, but there’s no secret to her success: she writes great material and sings it with unbeatable style.

toc_entry.title: Behind the Lines
toc_entry.description: On the team, off the team.

toc_entry.title: Touts
toc_entry.description: Hit the deck, shoot the breeze.

toc_entry.title: Around the State
toc_entry.description: A selective statewide guide to amusements and events.

toc_entry.title: Reporter
toc_entry.description: Hard times in Port arthur; the lost art of nasty correspondence lives on in Big Spring; the woes of Kathy Whitmire; the Newlywed Game comes to Midland; gloves off in the book business.

toc_entry.title: State Secrets
toc_entry.description: Big banks have interest in Delaware —but so far no principle; a price-fixing suit puts realtors out of commission; why some teachers don’t deserve a pav raise; a new kingmaker emerges in South Texas.
